item.title: Arctic Circle and Northern Lights Tour from Fairbanks
item.description: Go far off the beaten track on this small-group tour that takes you along one of the world's most isolated roads. Travel into the Alaskan wilderness along the Dalton Highway from Fairbanks to the edge of the Arctic Circle. On the way back, keep your eyes peeled for the Northern Lights.

image.alt: Arctic Circle and Northern Lights Tour from Fairbanks

item.location: Fairbanks, Alaska

item.title: Thundering Streams and Falls of the Smokies Guided Hiking Tour
item.description: The Great Smoky Mountains boast scenic views and this hiking tour takes you on a journey to find them. Join a small group and traverse through the lush landscapes to discover several streams, cascades, and creeks. Each season of the year puts on a different show for hikers so there's always something to enjoy. This is a moderately adventurous hike that gains elevation and climbs over downed trees.

image.alt: Thundering Streams and Falls of the Smokies Guided Hiking Tour

item.location: Gatlinburg, Tennessee

item.title: 3-Hour Nantahala River Fully Guided Rafting Experience
item.description: We have the best location on the Nantahala River being located right at the takeout. This means you'll only ride the bus once and you'll finish at your car. After the river, enjoy one of our two restaurants by the river.

image.alt: 3-Hour Nantahala River Fully Guided Rafting Experience

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Overnight Backpacking in the Smokies
item.description: Meet a naturalist guide at the Greenbrier entrance to Great Smoky Mountains National Park (directions listed in your voucher) for a walk in the woods. This moderately strenuous hike follows an Appalachian mountain path to several cascades. Rock-hop across streams and crest narrow ridges, then be rewarded by the sight of gorgeous cascades shrouded in lush greenery. Enjoy the intimacy of hiking with a small group.

image.alt: Overnight Backpacking in the Smokies

item.location: Gatlinburg, Tennessee

item.title: Great Smoky Mountains & Cades Cove Self-Guided Driving Tours
item.description: Since you’re probably not traveling with a park ranger in your car, this is the next-best thing. With this audio tour of Great Smoky Mountains National Park, you’ll discover the history of spots like Cade’s Cove, plus get intel on the best hiking trails, the best overlooks, the best waterfalls, and more. Use it only when you need, traveling at your pace—with a pro in your pocket.

image.alt: Great Smoky Mountains & Cades Cove Self-Guided Driving Tours

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Museum of the Cherokee People Admission Ticket
item.description: Learn about the history and culture of the Cherokee people with access to the Museum of the Cherokee. Book your ticket in advance to guarantee entry, and then visit on your own schedule. The museum is full of informative and interactive exhibits that are both kid-friendly and engaging for adults.

image.alt: Museum of the Cherokee People Admission Ticket

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Great Smoky Mountains National Park Self-Guided Driving Tour
item.description: Combine the convenience of a guided tour with the freedom of independent travel with this self-guided driving tour of Great Smoky Mountains National Park. Download the tour onto your phone and learn about Cherokee history and legends, Appalachian life, and more. See several of the park's best spots such as Clingman's Dome, and Rainbow Falls. Note: this does not include entrance to the park or attractions.

image.alt: Great Smoky Mountains National Park Self-Guided Driving Tour

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Historic River Town Ramble
item.description: Discover a bygone era on a 3-hour tour of Great Smoky Mountains National Park. Hear stories about the Cherokee people and settlers that lived and worked in the mountains, and learn how they survived off the land. See a small family cemetery, 19th-century barn and an old fashioned spring house, then get a glimpse of settlers’ daily lives in a small restored cabin. Enjoy a relaxed nature walk with a guide that brings the Smoky Mountains’ distinctive wildlife, plants and geology to life at every turn.

image.alt: Historic River Town Ramble

item.location: Gatlinburg, Tennessee

item.title: Cades Cove Sightseeing Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description: Explore beautiful Cades Cove in the Smoky Mountains without the hassle of a guided tour when you book this self-guided audio-driving tour. Experience the natural beauty and delve into the area’s rich history on this popular loop. Encounter cascading waterfalls, lush hiking trails, and historic churches, and uncover the tale of how the Civil War cast its shadow over this serene cove.

image.alt: Cades Cove Sightseeing Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Waterfalls and Breweries Tour from Bryson City, NC
item.description: Combine nature and craft beer in one convenient full-day excursion during this private trip to four waterfalls and five breweries in North Carolina, ideal for groups with varied interests. Plus, round-trip transportation means you can save your strength for the waterfall walks, before sampling your complimentary pints without worry.

image.alt: Waterfalls and Breweries Tour from Bryson City, NC

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Smoky Mountain Guided Scenic High Van Tour
item.description: Explore the Great Smoky Mountains with a small-group guided van tour. Set out on a sightseeing and nature-themed trip that includes a stroll along the famous Appalachian Trail. Skip the hassle of driving and learn about the history and wildlife of the Smokies while taking in mountain views. Several photo stops are included in the half-day itinerary.

image.alt: Smoky Mountain Guided Scenic High Van Tour

item.location: Gatlinburg, Tennessee

item.title: Fall Color Tour in the Smoky Mountains
item.description: For the curious traveler who wants more from their travels, this fall foliage tour can’t be beat. Following your guide—a biologist, ecologist, or park ranger—you’ll get a deeper understanding of this gorgeous area, walking or hiking through the scenic Great Smoky Mountains National Park. Get ready to learn, have fun, and scout out some brilliant autumn color and incredible Smoky Mountain views.

image.alt: Fall Color Tour in the Smoky Mountains

item.location: Gatlinburg, Tennessee

item.title: Scenic Blue Ridge Parkway Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description: Enjoy both the freedom of independent travel and the structure of a guided tour with a self-guided driving tour of the Blue Ridge Parkway. Download the app and get started from your own vehicle in Cherokee, Asheville, Roanoke, or Afton. Admire the views and look out for wildlife en route between the Great Smokies National Park and Shenandoah. Start and stop whenever you like as you’re in control.

image.alt: Scenic Blue Ridge Parkway Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Appalachian Trail Adventure
item.description: With this tour, you’ll go home saying you’ve hiked the Appalachian Trail. After meeting up with your guide, you’ll head on foot to some of the Great Smoky Mountains’ wildest geologic fomations, through dense spruce forests, and up to the other-worldly vistas on Anakeesta Ridge. You’ll visit a trail shelter and—the piece de resistance—stumble upon a hidden mountain meadow for panoramic views.

image.alt: Appalachian Trail Adventure

item.location: Gatlinburg, Tennessee

item.title: 30+ National Parks Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle
item.description: Explore more than 20 national parks, monuments, and forests across the country, including the Grand Canyon, Joshua Tree, and Acadia, with this self-guided driving tour bundle. Enjoy the flexibility to travel at your own pace, with hands-free functionality, and offline access, so you can use it even in remote areas. Includes full itineraries, travel tips, audio guide, videos, and text.

image.alt: 30+ National Parks Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle

item.location: Moab, Utah

item.title: Clingmans Dome Self Guided Walking Audio Tour
item.description:
Take your hike up Clingmans Dome to the next level with this self-guided walking tour. As you make the ascent to the famous observation deck, you’ll discover fascinating facts about this area’s history, geology, and scenery. And once you reach the top, you’ll be treated to panoramic views of the Great Smoky Mountains and the lush landscape beyond. This self-guided walking tour of Clingmans Dome serves as an audio companion on this half-mile hike, with plenty of stories to keep you company along the way.
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Clingmans Dome Self Guided Walking Audio Tour

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Blue Ridge Parkway (Cherokee to Asheville) Self-Guided Audio Tour
item.description:
From the mysterious Cherokee lands to the bustling metropolis of Asheville, drive the Blue Ridge Parkway. Explore the Appalachian Highlands and be astonished by lush scenery, panoramic views, and flowing waterfalls against misty blue peaks. Explore Cherokee history and animals to capture their essence. Asheville's artistic flair and historic charm will remind you of this route's wonderful balance of nature and culture.
Purchase one tour per car, not per person. Everyone listens together!
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Blue Ridge Parkway (Cherokee to Asheville) Self-Guided Audio Tour

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Blue Ridge Parkway
item.description:
Download the GuideAlong self-guided audio tour and you'll discover more on your Blue Ridge Parkway road trip. Hear fascinating behind-the-scenes stories, local tips and directions play automatically along the Parkway, all based on your location.
You'll be guided to all of the area's famous highlights as well as lessor known gems including an engineering marvel that's also the Parkway's most famous bridge, an iconic watermill, a mile-high suspension bridge and an ideal sunset spot sitting at the highest elevation.
Enjoy the freedom to explore offline at your own pace, spending more time at places that interest you, and bypass any that don’t.
✅ Stories, tips and directions play automatically based on your location ✅ Travel at your own pace ✅ Tour offline using GPS, no cell service or WiFi needed ✅ Suggested itineraries for half, full or multi day use ✅ No time limits or expiry, free updates ✅ Like having a tour guide along for the drive
Purchase one tour per vehicle.

image.alt: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Blue Ridge Parkway

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: 100+ Self Guided Driving & Walking Tours by Action
item.description: Enjoy over 100 self-guided driving and walking tours across the USA. Each tour is professionally narrated to provide context, uncover hidden gems, and explain historic events. Discover the happening streets of Brooklyn, and experience the wildlife of Yellowstone. Ranging from historic battlefields to national parks, the tour automatically begins when triggered by GPS, no signal or WiFi needed. The bundle is valid for one year after purchase.

image.alt: 100+ Self Guided Driving & Walking Tours by Action

item.location: Palm Springs, California

item.title: East Coast USA: Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour Bundle
item.description: Explore some of the best spots for fall foliage on the East Coast, including Acadia, Shenandoah, and Great Smoky Mountains national parks, Kancamagus Highway, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bar Harbor, Newport, Salem, and the Freedom Trail, with this self-guided driving tour. Enjoy the flexibility to travel at your own pace, with hands-free functionality, turn-by-turn directions, and offline access. Includes full itineraries, travel tips, audio guide, and text.

image.alt: East Coast USA: Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour Bundle

item.location: Bar Harbor, Maine

item.title: Great Smoky Mountains NP Driving Tour smartphone autoplay APP/GPS
item.description:
"On this GPS location aware driving tour, you™ll be guided through the Smokes and learn the story of the people that lived here, their history, the Cherokee, the settlers, and nature.
As you approach each point of interest you™ll hear about the stops and get tips on what to see and do.
This is a hands-free experience. Simply press play and put your phone down. As you drive the app knows where you are and plays the stories as you drive.
The tour never expires, take it anytime, as many times as you like.
This tour starts at the Cherokee Welcome Center."

image.alt: Great Smoky Mountains NP Driving Tour smartphone autoplay APP/GPS

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: North Carolina Streams and History
item.description: The Smoky Mountains are one of the most popular sites for hiking in North Carolina. Enjoy more than a simple walk in the woods when you choose this guided tour led by a professional naturalist. Together, you’ll wander through the Great Smoky Mountain National Park, taking in all of its beauty. The diverse landscape leads you to waterfalls, ancient forests, and crystal clear mountain streams.

image.alt: North Carolina Streams and History

item.location: Gatlinburg, Tennessee

item.title: Private Professional Photoshoot in the Smoky Mountains
item.description: Get ready for an unforgettable journey through the vibrant and diverse landscapes of the Smoky Mountains in Tennessee! We're excited to guide you on a leisurely exploration of this stunning region, showcasing the breathtaking natural beauty that the Smokies have to offer while also revealing hidden gems that many have yet to discover. Beyond capturing your moments with our professional photography, we're eager to share exclusive insights and tips to make your visit even more special. Immerse yourself in the Smoky Mountains' best-kept secrets with us, making every snapshot of your trip truly memorable. We can't wait to meet you and embark on this extraordinary adventure together!

image.alt: Private Professional Photoshoot in the Smoky Mountains

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Full Day Private Audio Guided Great Smoky Mountains National Park
item.description:
Welcome to Great Smoky Mountains National Park Tour! Come journey with us as we travel through stunning mountain scenery and explore the historical homes of days gone by.
The Great Smoky Mountains are the most visited national park in the country, often receiving over 14 million visitors every year! We've broken it down with the top things to do, including 14 stops in and around the park!
What you'll get:
Expert Narration: Learn about the park's heritage, ecology, and wildlife.
User-Friendly App: Access the tour easily on your smartphone.
Capture the Moment: Discover ideal photo spots for stunning panoramas and wildlife shots.
Immerse yourself in the beauty of the Great Smoky Mountains with our audio tour. Book now and embark on a journey you'll cherish for years to come!
The remaining hours in the tour details are allotted for the travel time.
*Download the Shaka Guide app to access your purchased tours.*

image.alt: Full Day Private Audio Guided Great Smoky Mountains National Park

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee
